titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an exclusion from gross income for student loan payments made by an employer on behalf of an employee.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/25/2004--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an exclusion from gross income of student loan payments made for an employee by an employer. Imposes upon such an employer a tax for failure to make comparable payments on certain education loans of employees.
